channel.title: Help quest
channel.description:
Ok im trying to make a quest but i have no idea what to do could some one post a tortuails for me please. if so thanks alot i will exsplain what i want in this quest
~~Quest name~~ The parallel world
Basicly what this adventure is about is where An adventure (player) Askes the wise old man what is going on and he say "Terbble wirror" Players says "Am i seeking a quest" Wise man says "yes i need you to go to varrock and find out about a secret portal" So the wirror sets oh and askes the guard about a portal they give him ideas on where abouts it must be So the wirror gose back to the wise man and tells hm the infomation The wise man askes for the Player to go into the portal. and defeat two monsters lvl 190s.. havent thurt of what monster yet And once the player has defeat the monsters he gose back to the wise man and tells him next the wise man and the player will go to varrock and see the portal close up like a rift. :D
I no what ur all gunna say what alode of bullshit or summet well i just have a mind.. lol bad comment all you like i was think if it was possble.

item.title: Help quest
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Go learn how to make simple quests from the tutorial section first…
Don’t expect someone to do the whole thing for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Help quest
item.dc:creator: @imantai imantai
item.description:
@imantai wrote:

Ok im trying to make a quest but i have no idea what to do could some one post a tortuails for me please. if so thanks alot i will exsplain what i want in this quest

Quest name
The parallel world

Basicly what this adventure is about is where An adventure (player)
Askes the wise old man what is going on and he say “Terbble wirror”
Players says “Am i seeking a quest”
Wise man says “yes i need you to go to varrock and find out about a secret portal”
So the wirror sets oh and askes the guard about a portal they give him ideas on where abouts it must be
So the wirror gose back to the wise man and tells hm the infomation
The wise man askes for the Player to go into the portal. and defeat two monsters lvl 190s… havent thurt of what monster yet And once the player has defeat the monsters he gose back to the wise man and tells him next the wise man and the player will go to varrock and see the portal close up like a rift.

I no what ur all gunna say what alode of bullshit or summet well i just have a mind… lol bad comment all you like i was think if it was possble.

Read full topic
